channel.title: poll on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in poll on David Amador

item.title: What are your target platforms for games?
item.description: I decided to run a little poll to track what platforms do you target as a game developer. I think this should be interesting. Please share this post link or the direct link to the poll (http://twtpoll.com/dar51l) so that we can have more accurate results. The poll closes in about 6 days and you can select various options of course.
item.content:encoded:
I decided to run a little poll to track what platforms do you target as a game developer. I think this should be interesting. Please share this post link or the direct link to the poll (http://twtpoll.com/dar51l) so that we can have more accurate results.

The poll closes in about 6 days and you can select various options of course.
